entry.title: [BHS7][Dedicated Servers] - Rooms B702/B703/B707/B709 maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 10, 10:00 - 20:00 UTC

Jan 13, 21:42 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be carrying out a maintenance on our electrical infrastructure.

Start time : 10/03/2026 10:00 UTC
End time : 10/03/2026 20:00 UTC
Service impact : Some servers located in rooms B702, B703, B707 and B709 might be temporarily unavailable from 10:30 UTC during the maintenance .
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our electrical infrastructure.

Thank you for your understanding.

Customers Impact : Some customers are temporarily unable to access and use their Virtual Private servers in BHS6

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

entry.title: [GLOBAL][Dedicated Servers] - Discontinuation of VMware ESXi 8.0 Free for RISE-S
entry.content:
Feb 5, 19:15 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Feb 5, 19:10 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Feb 5, 19:08 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our ongoing alignment with vendor compatibility requirements, we are removing ESXi 8.0 Free compatibility for RISE-S dedicated servers.

Start time : 05/02/2026 19:10 UTC
End time : 05/02/2026 19:15 UTC
Service impact : VMware ESXi 8.0 Free is no longer available for installation on our RISE-S dedicated servers (powered by AMD Ryzen 7 9700X processors) as of February 5, 2026.
Service improvement : As Broadcom has not certified Ryzen 7 9700X processors as compatible with ESXi, we are aligning our offerings with the vendor's official compatibility matrix.
Existing installations are not affected by this change.

Thank you for your understanding.
